about_the_game:
Uncover the Truth Behind the Cases No One Else Can Solve
Step into the shoes of a private detective and investigate mysteries shrouded in the supernatural. These cases are too bizarre for the police to handle, and it’s up to you to uncover the hidden truth. Play solo or team up with up to 3 other detectives to find the evidence that others missed, connect the dots, and expose secrets buried in the dark.

Key Features

  • Singleplayer or Co-op Gameplay: Play alone or join forces with up to 4 players in online co-op to tackle chilling cases together.

  • Immersive Investigations: Explore atmospheric locations, gather clues, and piece together the story to reveal the killer and their sinister motives.

  • Upgradeable Equipment: Purchase and enhance tools to aid in your investigations.

  • Supernatural Encounters: Face eerie phenomena as you dig deeper into mysteries that blend reality with the paranormal.

  • Replayability: Randomized evidence placements and timings ensure each playthrough feels unique.

  • Dynamic Investigations: Each case unfolds over 3 in-game days, with a unique cycle determining which evidence is revealed first, keeping every playthrough unpredictable.

  • Rich Atmosphere: Dive into hauntingly beautiful environments brought to life with detailed visuals and soundscapes.

Solve the unsolvable and face the unknown. The truth is out there—are you ready to uncover it?

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes depictions of blood, unsettling supernatural creatures, and flickering lights that may pose a seizure risk for sensitive individuals. Some evidence feature ropes in contexts that could suggest self-harm.
